        <div class="article-slideshow-title">
         5 Cheap Tips for Home Happiness
        </div>
        <div class="article-slideshow-heading">
         <div class="article-slideshow-sub-title">
          Lara Spencer, author of
          <i>
           <a href="http://www.amazon.com/Brake-Yard-Sales-Auctions-Occasional/dp/1584799226" target="_blank">
            I Brake for Yard Sales
           </a>
          </i>
          , reveals her strategies for decorating on a dime.
         </div>
         <div class="article-slideshow-byline">
          <span class="feedID_pagebyline">
           By Lara Spencer
          </span>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="article-left">
        <div class="article-content " data-index="1" data-type="slide_show">
         <div class="article-slide_show-body fashion" id="article37320">
          <div class="article-content-container">
           <div class="top-content">
            <div class="article-body">
             <div class="articleslide-slideshow-wrapper vertical">
              <div class="articleslide-slideshow">
               <div class="articleslide-image-nav">
                <div class="articleslide">
                 <div class="articleslide-image">
                  <div class="content_ad interstitial_content_ad">
                   <div data-adunit-position="pop" data-adunit-size="300x250,300x255" data-adunit-size-mobile="300x250,300x255,300x50">
                   </div>

                <a class="articleslide-arrow-large-left articleslide-arrow inactive" data-page="1" href="http://www.oprah.com/spirit/Cheap-Decorating-Ideas-Lara-Spencer/1">
                </a>
                <a class="articleslide-arrow-large-right articleslide-arrow " data-page="2" href="http://www.oprah.com/spirit/Cheap-Decorating-Ideas-Lara-Spencer/2">
                </a>
               </div>
               <div class="articleslide-page-indicator">
                1 of 5
               </div>
               <div class="slide-title">
                Hang It if You Love It
               </div>
               <div class="slide-text">
                Flea markets and estate sales are terrific places to find oil paintings, vintage signs, old mapseven beautiful pieces of wallpaper that can be framed. For example, there's a large chartreuse midcentury oil painting anchoring my living room that provides the inspiration for the color pops I use throughout the first floor. I got it at a garage sale, which means I have a one-of-a-kind, original painting that looks like a million bucksfor the same amount of money as a reproduction.
               </div>
